A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Bad Writing\, riddled with plot holes\, dropped subplots from the force awakens.  Took characters in directions that made no sense with other continuity in star wars cannon.  Very busy movie with too many plot lines that tied together very poorly.  Special effects were astounding and actors gave the best performances they could with the script as bad as it was.  Two thumbs up to the special effects team and the acting staff.  Lost opportunity overall.  Shame.
